location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant Robert Taylor, in charge at the Bushire Residency to Captain Clements

mods.abstract: The letter is responding to a request for protection from imposition from Captain Clements, which the Lieutenant has refused owing to his refusal to abide by a previous (unspecified) decision. It is noted the matter has been referred to the Bombay Government and Lord Minto, the Governor General of India.
